title: StanChart resumes dividend but revenues disappoint
text:
StanChart resumes dividend but revenues disappoint 8:53am EST - 01:35 
Standard Chartered resumes paying dividends after posting a six-fold jump in annual pretax profit, but weaker-than-expected revenue dampens any celebration from investors. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Standard Chartered resumes paying dividends after posting a six-fold jump in annual pretax profit, but weaker-than-expected revenue dampens any celebration from investors. David Pollard reports.
